_sText:
TWO CHAMBERS!Â 

Two Chambers is a 4 vs 4 bomb defusing map, you already know how it works, this map specifically took me 3 days to finish and it is the first (completed) one I have done as well as Hammer Base and Hammer ++.

HATE IT, LOVE IT, LOOK FOR ANY SMALLEST ERROR AND INSULT ME IN THE COMMENTS FOR IT.


The map consists of 2 rooms at opposite poles. In both, a single participant will spawn from their respective spawn, while the other participants will spawn behind the same room.

These same 2 rooms have a wall in front of them, the only difference between the 2 is that the CT Spawn contains a staircase and a balcony on the wall in front of it.

Anything else to say?:


IF YOU PLAY WITH BOTS, ENTER THE MAP AND WRITE "nav_generate" IN THE CONSOLE.
This way you avoid any problems that may occur with the navmesh and bots.
